name: Sales Forums
description: Discussions and news from sales communities.
selectionPrompt: Pick sales content with proven tactics or frameworks: 1) data‑backed prospecting/outreach methods, 2) deal execution and negotiation strategies, 3) pipeline/forecasting excellence, 4) sales ops and tooling that move the needle. Favor clear examples and results.
essencePrompt: Explain the key tactic or framework, when to use it, and the expected outcome. Include one short example if possible.
perspectivesPrompt: Three angles: 1) Practical application (scripts/process), 2) Risks and anti‑patterns, 3) Metrics and validation to prove it works.
